feature1.explanation: Both texts contain hyphens, commas, and quotation marks used similarly.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, using complex vocabulary and unique expressions.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are complex, with varied lengths and arrangements, maintaining coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar sarcastic and critical tone, using idiomatic expressions and a narrative style focused on personalities.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
